summary: A strange wind blows into Whoville, making all the inhabitants stay indoors. They know the wind means the Grinch will be in a foul mood and out to do harm. However, young Eukariah decides to confront the Grinch.
cast: Hans Conried|Hal Smith|Gary Shapiro|Irene Tedrow|Jack DeLeon|Henry Gibson
title: Halloween Is Grinch Night
